input.name: __VIEWSTATE

p.span: Governor Tom Wolf, has ordered that
all Pennsylvania schools remain closed through the end of the school year. We will continue to provide educational services according to our

span.p: Lunch will be available for students Monday-Friday during the closure. Please visit this article for time and pickup locations.

img.alt: Aerial photo of the Farrell Area School District complex
Students working on their projects in Farrell High School's new STEAM lab
Farrell Area High School 2019 NHS Induction
2018-19 Back-to-school Million Father March at Farrell Area School District

br.span: We have developed a Continuity of Education plan that will guide us during the school closure.
This article is being constantly updated with any COVID-19 (Coronavirus) information as it becomes available.
This article will be updated with valuable online learning resources that can be used during the school closure.
Please click this article to read a letter written by Superintendent Dr. Lora Adams-King regarding COVID-19 (Coronavirus).
Please click this article to read a letter jointly written by Mercer County Superintendents regarding COVID-19 (Coronavirus).
For the safety of our students and staff, all visitors are required to present photo ID when signing in.

img.title: The Farrell High School auditorium entrance decorated for Veterans Day

br.span: Farrell Elementary students observed Veterans Day by honoring community veterans

img.title: Farrell Area School District Flying F Logo

br.span: Quickly and securely pay online for things such as dues, field trips, dance and performance tickets, and more!
Traffic flow on Roemer Blvd will be one way in the morning and during dismissal on school days.

img.title: Farrell High School PennDOT Innovations Challenge finalists and their adviser.
img.alt: Three Students Finalists in PennDOT Challenge

div.a: Three Students Finalists in PennDOT Challenge

br.span: Three students will represent Farrell High School at the PennDOT Innovations Challenge on April 10.

span.p: Welcome to the Farrell Area School District where we strive to create excellence in education through empowerment and positive, social interaction.READ MORE

div.span: 1600 Roemer Blvd | Farrell, PA 16121 | Phone: 724-346-6585 | Fax: 724-346-0223

SCHOOL PUBLICITY INFORMATION: Throughout the school year, students' pictures and names may be placed in articles in the newsletter, local newspapers, and this website to inform the community-at-large about the unique projects and programs that are taking place in the Farrell Area School District. If you DO NOT wish to have your child(ren)'s name and/or picture used in such publications, please notify the School Relations Office at 724-509-1304.
